title: Quarkus Newsletter #28 - January
content: A fresh new year is a perfect time for some fresh new articles in the Quarkus Newsletter. "Fine-grained authorization for Quarkus microservices" by Raffaele Spazzoli is a great article describing a solution we call fine-grained authorization and uses Quarkus to implement Relationship-Based Access Control (ReBAC) in the manner of Google...
